text: We will hear arguments next here on 76-447, Milliken v. Bradley.
Mr. Chief Justice Burger, may it please the Court.
Mr. Chief Justice, may it please the Court.
Thank you Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court.

Mr. Jones, have other courts in devising a remedy for an unconstitutionally segregated public school system, have other courts included in the remedy these educational adjuncts or is this case unique?
This is not unique Mr. Justice Stewart, this is not unique.
Mr. Chief Justice, I believe we will waive any rebuttal and thank the justices.
As I recall reading and memorizing that matter beyond pupil reassignment.
